channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russell Brand pleads not guilty to rape, sexual assault charges in U.K.
item.description: On Friday, Brand pleaded not guilty to five counts of rape and assault that date back more than 25 years. He says the charges are politically motivate...

item.title: Trump to celebrate U.S. Steel deal with Japan. And, what's next for DOGE
item.description: President Trump is heading to Pittsburgh today to celebrate U.S. Steel and Nippon Steel's partnership. And, what's next for DOGE after Elon Musk's exi...

item.title: Oil companies face a wrongful death suit tied to climate change
item.description: Julie Leon died of hyperthermia in Seattle on June 28, 2021 — the hottest day in the city's history. A lawsuit claims she was a victim of oil companie...

item.title: Supreme Court allows Trump administration to end humanitarian status for some migrants
item.description: The move to grant a stay in the case means that the Cubans, Haitian, Nicaraguans and Venezuelans who were granted temporary parole under the program k...

item.title: Can this nasal spray slow down Alzheimer's? One couple is helping scientists find out
item.description: Joe Walsh is the first Alzheimer's patient to be treated with an experimental nasal spray designed to reduce inflammation in the brain.

item.title: Ukraine awaiting Russia peace proposal ahead of Istanbul talks
item.description: Russia says it is sending its negotiating team to Istanbul for a second round of talks.

item.title: Floods kill at least 110 people after heavy rain in Nigeria
item.description: Torrential rains in the central town of Mokwa led to the deadly floods, authorities say.

item.title: More ICE shakeups as Trump "border czar" says arrests could be higher
item.description: The U.S. Immigration and Customs Agency (ICE) announced major leadership changes, as well as other staffing shifts, according to a news release from t...

item.title: New Banksy mystery location revealed
item.description: The new piece of street art depicts the shadow of a lighthouse emerging out of a bollard.

item.title: Bon Appétit reveals its list of the best new bars in America for 2025
item.description: Jamila Robinson, editor-in-chief of Bon Appétit and Epicurious, joins "CBS Mornings Plus" to unveil the 2025 Best New Bars list. Highlights include Gu...

item.title: Watch Live: Biden makes first public remarks since cancer diagnosis
item.description: Former President Joe Biden is making his first public remarks since his office announced​ he was diagnosed with an "aggressive form" of prostate cance...

item.title: MoneyWatch price tracker shows how much food, utility, housing costs are rising
item.description: These charts track prices consumers pay for groceries and other goods now compared to five years ago.

item.title: Suspect in South African student's murder killed in police shootout
item.description: The main suspect in the murder of Olorato Mongale was found by police on Friday morning.

item.title: US says China trade talks have stalled as Trump tariffs temporarily reinstated
item.description: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent earlier said Trump and Xi Jinping may need to get directly involved in talks.

item.title: CDC now says kids "may receive" COVID-19 vaccines
item.description: The CDC dropped a broad recommendation for all children to get vaccinated against COVID-19.

item.title: Trump administration increases pressure on ‘sanctuary jurisdictions’ with public listing
